data.event: Organized in 1780, Lincoln County was not named for the later president (b. 1809), but for the American Revolutionary War general Benjamin Lincoln.

event.title: was not named for the later president (b. 1809

data.event: Organized in 1780, Lincoln County was not named for the later president (b. 1809), but for the American Revolutionary War general Benjamin Lincoln.
The county's original seat was at Harrodsburg, but that part of Lincoln County became Mercer County in 1785.
